= Planned Models =

1.  *Diffusion on a Directed Network*:  diffusion of a quantity through a directed network
  * http://ccl.northwestern.edu/netlogo/models/DiffusiononaDirectedNetwork
2.  *Ethnocentrism*:  model of ethnocentric behavior and its evolution
  * http://ccl.northwestern.edu/netlogo/models/Ethnocentrism
3.  *Preferential Attachment*:  network generation by preferential attachment
  * http://ccl.northwestern.edu/netlogo/models/PreferentialAttachment
4.  *RepastSim*:  adaptation of discrete-event simulation toolkit originally programmed in VBA
5.  *Small Worlds*:  formation of networks resulting in "small world" phenomenon
  * http://ccl.northwestern.edu/netlogo/models/SmallWorlds
6.  *Team Blackjack*:  exploration of team strategies for blackjack, inspired by [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MIT_Blackjack_Team MIT Blackjack Team]
7.  *Traffic Grid*:  real-time traffic simulation
  * http://ccl.northwestern.edu/netlogo/models/TrafficGrid
8.  *Virus on a Network*:  spread of a virus through a network
  * http://ccl.northwestern.edu/netlogo/models/VirusonaNetwork
